template.name: demo_http_get_query_no_token
template.value: def $function_name$(): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = conf.GY_API_URL + '$uri$' #请求数据，字典格式 query = $dict_query$ resp = request_tool.get_request(url,params=query) body = resp.json() # 断言响应码 with allure.step("断言响应状态码：实际结果：{}，预期结果：{}".format(resp.status_code,200)):pass assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 #实际结果 actual = "$actual$" #预期结果 expect = '$expect$' with allure.step("断言$assert$：实际结果：{}，预期结果：{}".format(actual,expect)):pass assert_tool.assert_equal(actual, expect)
